forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Winds increasing late. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Becoming windy. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 41F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Partial clearing late. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.
